B072DVZ5SC.title: Le Parfait French Terrines Wide Mouth Glass Canning Jar with 100mm Gasket, 750 Grams (Pack of 2)

descriptions.title: Product Description
descriptions.content: he Super Jar is an upscale take on the standard canning jar, offering the versatility of a rounded shape and Le Parfait's clean design. With the solid, easy construction of a hinged, bail lid, the jar features a large mouth and concave neck that makes filling and storing preserves with ease, so you don't have to worry about spilling sauces or pickled vegetables after the jar is opened. The bright, clear glass beautifully displays the contents inside, and the wide lid allows easy stacking for storage. Wire-bail lid makes this fantastic for a short-term storage option Built for quality, the Super Jar uses the iconic wire bail and the often imitated, but never duplicated, famous orange rubber seal, so you can feel good in your preservation. This system keeps the contents air tight, which means a long-term shelf life. For general storing, it opens easily and closes tightly, keeping contents secure. Le Parfait gaskets cannot be reused for heat treating. Displaying or storing gaskets on Le Parfait jars may damage them for canning purposes. Jars are shipped with a paper seal and the gaskets inside for their protection. Its clean design will have you using it every day The Super Jar's shape and sizes are good for soups or sauces, cut and whole pickles and vegetables, crushed tomatoes and fruits, olives, salsas, baby food, seeds and nuts, spice and salt mixes, compound butters, ground or whole bean coffee. The jar's design also makes it a decorative element for non-canning needs. Use it as a gift container for sweets and nuts or a base for candles.

Feature: Includes Two 750 Gram (.75 Liter) Le Parfair Glass Canning Jars - Made in France
Made from thick glass which can handle the heat of the canning process which keeps the product air tight, allowing long-term preservation.

With the solid, easy construction of a hinged, bail lid, the jar features a large mouth and concave neck that makes filling and storing preserves with ease, so you don't have to worry about spilling sauces or pickled vegetables after the jar is opened.
Le Parfait jars are useful for keeping nuts, grains, and other things, as they keep out weevils, moisture, and other unwanted influences from the outside world

descriptions.title: Product Description
descriptions.content:
Stonewall Kitchen Farmhouse Pancake and Waffle Mix, 16 oz

Everyone loves pancakes for breakfast. But what makes ours so special? We think our secret ingredient of malted flour makes our Farmhouse Pancake & Waffle Mix perfection. It not only makes our pancakes light and fluffy, but it also creates a rich vanilla aroma and flavor that's simply delicious. After the launch of our pancake & waffle mix in 2000, it quickly became a top seller. In fact, it still is! Our guests regularly tell us it makes the best pancakes they've ever had.

About Stonewall Kitchen

Founded in 1991 by partners Jonathan King and Jim Stott, the two established themselves selling jams and jellies at local farmers' markets, fairs and festivals with their flavorful line of distinctive and high quality food items. Over time, they expanded their product line to include sauces, condiments, mustards and baking mixes. Today, products are sold in more than 6,000 wholesale accounts nationwide and internationally and through the company's 10 retail company stores and catalog and web divisions. Stonewall Kitchen is the winner of 29 prestigious awards from the Specialty Food Association and is a three time recipient of the coveted Outstanding Product Line award.

descriptions.title: Product Description
descriptions.content: Our maple cream is made fresh daily so you can be sure you are getting nothing but the freshest maple cream possible. You'll also be glad to know that we use (no preservatives) in our maple cream so when we say pure maple, we actually mean it. Our maple cream is so smooth and creamy that it will remain spreadable right out of the fridge. (Refrigeration is not necessary if used on a daily or semi daily basis.) It is here, in this peaceful little border town of Franklin, VT that our family has been producing some of the finest quality maple syrup that mother nature has to offer for over a century. Right smack dab in the heart of maple country. Our maple syrup is 100% all natural and 100% sustainable. You'll be glad to know that we are still tapping the very same trees that our ancestors were tapping back in 1912. The year it all began. Over the years we have perfected the art of making maple cream. We only use our early season Medium amber syrup for making maple cream which gives it that perfectly smooth and creamy texture with absolutely to die for maple flavor. Our maple cream is made from nothing more than 100% pure maple syrup. No preservatives or additives. On an average year only about 5 percent of our entire maple crop qualifies for making maple cream. We think that you'll agree that after one taste, you'll be hooked.

descriptions.title: Product Description
descriptions.content:
100% Pure Organic Maple Syrup from Canada

Nothing compares to the delicious "home sweet home!" taste of genuine Canadian maple syrup:

  • 100% pure, certified organic Canadian maple syrup
  • Grade A: Amber Rich Taste - Non-GMO, and gluten-free
  • 32 oz. BPA-free jug

So Tasty, So Versatile

Of course use Canadian Maple Farms Organic Maple Syrup with pancakes, waffles, French toast and breakfast treats. Drizzle onto yogurt, fruits and cheeses, ice cream. Perfect for barbecue sauces and glazes. A wonderful sweetener for baking and recipes. Genuine maple syrup from Canada is a wonderful, natural, and healthy sweetener.

Organic Maple Syrup by Canadian Maple Farms is non-GMO, and gluten-free. We are committed to your health, happiness, and satisfaction.

The Canadian Maple Farms Difference

Canadian Maple Farms is a small maple syrup producer in Quebec. We've been sourcing from local farms for over a century. Springtime is harvest time for our syrup: sap from local sugar maple trees is harvested, collected, and transformed into delicious, authentic Canadian maple syrup.

Home-style taste and authentic Canadian syrup goodness! Support small farms and organic foods, it's the best quality and it's the right thing to do.

From Our Families to Yours

Canadian Maple Farms Organic Maple Syrup is made with love and a passion to share an authentic Canadian tradition with the world. We love our maple syrup and we know you'll love it too! Support our small Canadian farms and you'll taste the difference. Check before you buy, make sure you're getting authentic Canadian maple syrup (known as the world's best) and from small farms committed to quality.

descriptions.content: Nova Maple Syrup is family produced in Northwest Pennsylvania, sustainably harvested from our own hardwood forests. International Grading System - Nova Maple Syrup uses the new International Grading System that took effect in April 2015. All of the syrup we sell is Grade-A, though the sub-grades will vary based on the weather, trees, and individual season. We ship Grade-A Golden Delicate Taste, Amber Rich, Dark Robust, and Very Dark Strong. We will NOT ship the new Grade-B Commercial (formerly Grade-C) syrup. B0016N1TPA.title: Marinex Glass Fluted Flan or Quiche Dish, 10-1/2-Inch

descriptions.title: Product Description
descriptions.content: Marinex Glass Bakeware production began over 50 years ago by Santa Marina, the largest glass manufacturer in Latin America. Located in Brazil, Santa Marina has been producing different glass products since 1895. The factory location is close to raw material deposits of boron and sand which is rich in color and quality. During the production process, these raw materials are combined using heat to make borosilicate glass. Borosilicate glass is resistant to changes in temperatures used in cooking and baking. The raw materials also give Marinex glass bakeware a slight bluish tint consistant throughout all pieces. Marinex Glass Bakeware offers several shapes and sizes that have countless uses in culinary activities and are prominent by their beauty, durability, and ease of cleaning. It can be used to prepare, bake, and serve food as well as to freeze prepared food. It is safe for both conventional ovens and microwave ovens. Marinex Bakeware can go from the freezer/refrigerator to a pre-heated oven where the oven temperature does not exceed 100C or 212F to start. However, Marinex Bakeware should not be used on stovetop burners or over a direct flame. This is a 1.6qt. large round souffle dish that measures 10-1/2" x 1-3/8" . All Marinex bakeware is dishwasher safe. Item #GD16237414

Feature: Prepare, cook, serve, and store in the same cooking vessel
Freezer to oven to table to refrigerator
Use in conventional or microwave ovens
1.6qt capacity measures 10-1/2" diameter x 1-3/8"
Consistent bluish tint to all pieces

descriptions.title: Product Description
descriptions.content:
Protect your oven and stove gap from those nasty, hard to clean spills with our Vremi Oven Liners Whether you’re a professional cooking master or a weekend pizza warrior, having the right oven accessories and stove top covers make all the difference. These oven mats and stovetop burner protectors help reduce cleanup and protect your gas or electric ovens from food runoff. From cooking to cleaning, these durable, reusable, and heat resistant liners catch messes from sauces, cheese, baked goods, and more: Wipe off the leftovers with ease.

Product Details & Care
  • Includes 3 pack of oven liners
  • Dimension: 23 x 16.25 in (58.4 x 41.3 cm)
  • Thickness: 0.2 mm
  • Heat Safe up to 500°F
  • Materials: PTFE coated fiberglass fabric, BPA free & PFOA free
  • To clean: Place inside the dishwasher or hand wash with mild soapy water
Product Safety
  • DO NOT PUT OVEN LINERS DIRECTLY ON OVEN FLOOR
  • Use on lowest bottom RACK or SHELF of your oven
  • Do NOT put in direct contact with fire or flames, burners, grill or heating elements
  • ALWAYS allow hot oven to COOL before removing the oven liners
  • CAUTION: Hot surface. Use protective gloves or mitts when removing liner from oven
  • For full care instructions and safety warnings, always refer to Vremi product box or manual

Feature: OVEN LINER MINIMIZES MESS - Keep your cleaner convection oven and stove tops with these 3 thick oven liners. Use them on the bottom rack of your oven as spill mat or as stove top gas range protectors to eliminate sticky mess on stove gap or oven floor

REUSABLE HEAVY DUTY SHEET PROTECTORS - Made from high quality reusable PTFE-coated fiberglass fabric that can be used over and over again. Each BPA and PFOA free mat can be cut into different sizes to fit smaller toaster ovens, baking pans or sheets

MULTIPURPOSE NON STICK BAKING SHEETS - This burner protector not only works as stove top covers for electric or gas burners but can also be used as fridge liner, baking or cookie sheet. You can also use it under dishes when serving food

DURABLE & HEAT SAFE UP TO 500°F - Each 0.2mm thick nonstick stovetop cover is created heat resistant and heat safe up to 500°F making it perfect to use when baking cookie, roasting vegetables, or cooking meat, fish or pizza. Do NOT use it on an open flame or with ovens above 500°F

DISHWASHER SAFE REMOVABLE LINERS - Each 23 x 16.25 inches long oven and bbq grill mat are dishwasher safe or can be easily cleaned by hand washing with mild soapy water. Roll each reusable oven pan liner for more convenient storing

Aluminum Grill Pans Will Keep Your Grill or BBQ Clean All the Time!

When the juice drips everywhere from the succulent meats roasting on the BBQ,
or vegetable skewers always seem to get stuck on the grill you may want to give up barbecuing for good.

The solution? is using this disposable grill pan!

The ribbed bottom creates those authentic looking grill lines and evenly cooks all your food.
Cleanup takes no time at all because you can throw the tray straight in the trash or recycling.

General Features:
✔ Even Cooking - Don't worry about placing the food into these flat sheet pans.
The high-quality aluminum ensures they will cook evenly all the way through.

✔ Ribbed Bottom - The ribbed textured bottom surface offers that griddled, authentic grill line that everyone loves to see on their BBQ dishes.

✔ Multiuse - Not just for meat. You can also grill seafood, fish, vegetables or even fruit.

✔ Pack of 25 - Great value pack and economical. A Set of 25 grill pans should last a long time.

✔ Disposable - No more washing up greasy trays or greasy grills.
Save yourself time and effort by using disposable trays that can go straight into the trash or recycling when you're done cooking.

✔ Oven Safe - These trays are made to withstand the even the highest temperatures.
Cook with them inside your home oven for delicious grilled dishes.

✔ Fridge/Freezer Safe - Be organized and prepare your food ahead of time.
Whether you just want to marinate the ribs, steak or chicken in the fridge or prepare for an upcoming event.
These trays can go straight into the fridge or freezer.

attributes.Label: DOBI
attributes.LegalDisclaimer:
RECOMMENDATION

Aluminum is one the world's most prevalent elements and is found naturally in drinking water and in unprocessed foods.

Depending on several factors cooking or storing food in aluminum pans elevates the levels of aluminum in the foodstuff.

For this reason, in correspondence with international recommendations, we advise that consumers avoid the use of the pans with acidic or salted foodstuffs.
Examples of such foods may include - apple sauce, rhubarb, tomato puree, salt herring, leafy vegetables, tomatoes, citrus products, vinegar and different types of pickles, etc.

We recommend lining the pans with unbleached parchment paper when it is permissible (parchment paper is usually oven safe for use below 420F/215C but be sure to check each manufacturers guidelines).

Notwithstanding the above please note that the United States Department of Health has determined that - "aluminum levels found in processed foods and foods cooked in aluminum pots are generally considered to be safe."

Furthermore - "The FDA has determined that aluminum used as food additives and medicinals such as antacids are generally safe."

This information is shared to better inform you, our customer, as to the right use cases for products made of aluminum.

This information is in regard to general use of aluminum cookware / bakeware / storage containers and shouldn't be taken into account specifically to DOBIs products.

CAUTION:

- Support pans bottom surface when lifting and transporting.
- Clean pans before using them.
- Do not use in microwave.
- Do not reuse pans.

descriptions.title: Product Description
descriptions.content:
Just like a kid eating a plate of spaghetti with meatballs, cooking makes a mess. So naturally, you need to put a bib on it. While you can't really cover your entire kitchen with a plastic tarp every time you cook -- though that would be the best solution -- you can at least cover your stovetop with gas range protectors.
So next time you're boiling a pot of water and it overflows, don't sweat it. If you're making tomato sauce and it splatters everywhere, "eh, it's no big deal." If you spill an entire jar of maple syrup on it, IT'S OKAY, because you've got a gas range protector on it.
Features
- 10 Pack Premium Stove top Protectors sized 10.6" x 10.6", black
- Perfect for nearly ALL types of gas ranges
- Heat-resisting，Safe up to 500 degrees Fahrenheit
- Non-Stick and Reusable
- Non-toxic, Material: Coated Glass Fiber Cloth
- Can be cut to size
- Wipes clean
- Dishwasher safe and safe for contact food, chemical resistance etc.
- Non-Stick and Reusable
How to use
1. Measure and mark the size of the stove top above the stovetop protectors.
2. Clip the pre-cut inner circle of this Stovetop burner covers to get the correct size.
3. Put the clipped gas stove burner protector on the gas stove. 
Attention
Place liner at least 1/2" to 1" from heat source at highest setting. Material is not 100% Fireproof. Do not place directly on flame or element. PLS NOTICE: they do not smell/burn/curl even with extreme heat, but they will be burn if touched by the flame. CUSTOMER SERVICE:
Please do mail us if you face any problems or not happy with the item, our team is always there for you to resolve any issues or do a full refund.

Feature: ✔ PRACTICALITY - These gas hob protectors are the solution to your messy cooking ways. These are a non-stick, one-wipe clean, reusable cover for your stove top. The gas hob protectors come as a set of ten and can easily be cut down to fit your individual stove size
✔ ANTI-STICKING - Be used of glass fiber cloth that coated with high quality teflon, which have strong anti-sticking function, easy to clean oil stains and reusable.
✔ HEAT-RESISTNT - Can be maintained the original physical form (will not be deformed) in -70℃ ~ +260℃ temperature processing, even can reach to 380℃.
✔ NON-TOXIC & SAFETY - FDA approved, BPA free, 100% satisfaction, Reusable, PFOA free, Can be also used safely in the dishwasher, non-toxic and safe with anti-corrosion function.

✔ EASY TO CLEAN & USE -Reusable: Do not through it away when the surface is dirty. It is fully reusable on both sides, and also can be easily removed and washed by hot soapy water! Or just throw the dirty gas stove burner covers in the dishwasher and replace a new one.

Still worried about the strong odor of the accumulated grease on the surface of your gas stove?

-Choose The stove burner covers to maintain your kitchen clean.


Why choose it?

-They can be used to cover the gas stove. All you need is to cut them into the desired size to fit your stove burner before the first use.

-The stove top remains clean after cooking and the protectors can be cleaned easily with soap water. 

Certainly, dishwasher is a great idea to clean them. Therefore, you will no longer worry about grease or water splashing from your pan.


Specifications:

-Material: PTFE coated fiberglass fabric.

-Color: Silver

-Enlarged Size: 10.6 * 10.6 inch

-Upgraded Thickness: 0.2 mm

-Withstands temperatures up to 500℉ (it is not resistant to fire). Avoid direct contact with flames.

Features:

-Protect your stove top from gas burns or leaks.

-The non-stick protector keeps your kitchen clean and ready to cook again.

-Suitable for almost all gas stove when being cut easily.

-No Wrinkles.

-Dishwasher safe (also easy to clean by hand).


How to use it?

-Just remove the gas burner grill fixture simply. Place the Gas Stove Protectors. Match and mark the center of the burner before cutting to fit the right size.

-Trim Gas Stove Protectors to fit different sizes of gas stoves according to your need. The center of the protector should be cut with scissors to fit the gas

stove burner properly before use.

-Just remove the gas burner grill fixture simply. Place the Gas Stove Protectors and match the center of the burner.


We pay attention to your product experience. If you have any problems during the usage, please do not hesitate to contact us.

❤ EASY TO WASH & Reusable --- The protectors can be washed with water and soap or in the dishwasher and they are completely reusable and resistant to food, grease, and water. Shrug off burnt-on food and grease on gas stove and save time on cleaning.

❤ SIZE --- The stove burner covers adapt different stoves because of the enlarged size (10.6" * 10.6") with UPGRADED double thickness (0.2 mm). The center of the protectors may need to be cut to fit your stove properly before use. PTFE Coated Fiberglass provides great quality that ensures your stove to be sparkling longer.

❤ SATISFACTION GUARANTEE --- For any reasons, if you would like to return your products, we perform full refund policy strictly. We are also glad to answer your questions during your using experience. Please feel free to let us know when you need us; we will send out our help as soon as we receive your request.

descriptions.title: Product Description
descriptions.content: The DEWALT 18-Volt 1/2-Inch Cordless Compact Drill/Driver is a versatile tool that makes quick work of a variety of driving and fastening tasks. With its high-performance motor, dual-range variable-speed control, and compact size, this tool is powerful and easy to handle. It also features a 1/2-inch, single-sleeve key less ratcheting chuck to reduce bit slippage. The DEWALT drill/driver's high-performance motor is capable of delivering a maximum of 380 unit watts out, providing enough power for a broad range of applications. The tool also features dual-range variable-speed control--0 to 450 rpm and 0 to 1,500 rpm--that makes material-specific performance easier to achieve. The drill/driver is built with an ergonomic grip for comfortable handling to help you get accurate results. Its balanced, mid-handle grip makes control easy, providing comfort and reduced fatigue when tackling extended projects. This tool weighs 4.75 pounds to minimize user fatigue. Its durable construction makes for reliable operation even on the toughest jobsites. The drill/driver also features a compact size to fit into tight spaces, making it convenient for both use and storage. This DEWALT tool allows you to move quickly between projects without the hassle of a cord. Stay on point with the drill/driver's 1/2-inch, single-sleeve keyless ratcheting chuck, which effectively reduces bit slippage as you work.

Feature: Compact size to fit into tight spots. Weighs 4.7 pounds.
Dual speed range (0-to-450 RPM and 0-to-1,500 RPM).
High-performance motor delivers up to 380 unit watts.
Identical in specifications and features as the DC970 drill.
In easy-to-open bulk packaging to pass the savings on to you.

B002VWK5RI.title: DEWALT DC390B 6-1/2-Inch 18-Volt Cordless Circular Saw (Tool Only)

descriptions.title: Product Description
descriptions.content: The DeWalt DC390 is a 18V cordless circular saw (and is the tool only). The saw uses 6-1/2 inch carbide tipped blade for 2x cutting capacity at 90 and 45 degrees. It has high strength magnesium shoe and upper guard provides increased durability. 0-50 degree bevel capacity provides additional capacity for a multitude of applications. It features fan-cooled motor with replaceable brushes for maximum power and durability.

descriptions.title: Amazon.com
descriptions.content:
Whether building wood decks or dormers, bookcases or kitchen cabinets, the professional-duty DEWALT DC390B 18-volt, 6-1/2-inch cordless circular saw delivers cordless convenience without sacrificing power or performance. An 18-volt battery (not included) drives the saw's 6-1/2-inch, thin-kerf blade at 3,700 RPM, an optimum speed for crosscutting and ripping construction lumber, softwood, hardwood, plywood, particleboard, oriented-strand board, and virtually any other sheet.



3,700 RPM for fast rip cuts and cross cuts
(view larger).

Power and Performance

With depth-of-cut capacities of 2-1/4-inch at 90-degrees and 1-5/8-inch at 45-degree (bevel), the DC390B can slice through all 2-by dimensional lumber. The 6-1/2-inch carbide tipped blade gives you 2x cutting capacity at 90 and 45 degrees, and the 0-50-dgree bevel capacity provides additional capacity for a multitude of applications.

A high strength magnesium shoe and upper guard provides increased durability, while a fan-cooled motor with replaceable brushes provides maximum power and durability. It's complemented by a vibration-dampening rubber-grip handle for comfortable handling on big jobs. This circular saw weighs 6.3 pounds.

Bare Tool

This DEWALT cordless tool does not come with a battery or charger. It's compatible with the DC9096 18-volt XRP battery pack and DW9117 15-minute charger.

Warranty

This DEWALT tool is backed by three-year limited warranty covering any defects due to faulty materials or workmanship (from the date of purchase). It's also covered by DEWALT's one-year free service contract, where DEWALT will maintain the tool and replace worn parts caused by normal use--for free.

What's in the Box

One DEWALT DC390B 18-volt 6-1/2-inch cordless circular saw, one carbide tipped blade, one blade wrench, and operating instructions (batteries and charger sold separately).

Feature: 3,700 RPM for fast rip cuts and cross cuts
6-1/2-inch carbide tipped blade for 2x cutting capacity at 90  degrees and 45  degrees
High strength magnesium shoe and upper guard provides increased durability
0-50  degrees bevel capacity provides additional capacity for a multitude of applications
Fan-cooled motor with replaceable brushes for maximum power and durability; tool only, no battery

B00SJQWPS2.title: Mrs. Anderson's Baking Non-Stick Silicone Toaster Oven Baking Mat, 7.875-Inch x 10.87-Inch

descriptions.title: Product Description
descriptions.content: Mrs. Anderson’s Non-Stick Silicone Toaster Oven Baking Mat is a commercial-grade silicone mat designed for the home baker and specially sized for toasting, reheating, melting, browning and baking foods in standard toaster ovens and convection ovens. A must-have of baking tools and toaster oven accessories for quick meals and easy cleanup. Keeps toaster ovens cleaner, too! Woven glass fibers sealed inside the Baking Mat transfer heat evenly, so foods cook perfectly, every time. Naturally nonstick, foods release quickly and easily without oiling or greasing the surface. Perfect for those watching their calories. Strong and durable, it will outlast thousands of uses at a wide range of temperatures (-40 degrees to 480 degrees Fahrenheit). Perfect for reheating pizza or lasagna, making cinnamon toast, open-faced cheese sandwiches, tuna melts, toasted mac and cheese, roasted veggies, French fries, quick snacks, single-serving cookies, and more. Reusable and more economical than using parchment paper, it holds 12 (2-inch) or 6 (2.5-inch) cookies. Simply lay the non-stick Baking Mat, with writing side facing up, directly onto the toaster oven rack, or a toaster oven size baking sheet or cookie sheet. Place items to be heated or baked onto the Baking Mat, and pop it into the toaster oven. Mrs. Anderson’s Baking FDA-approved Silicone Mats sealed, non-porous surface eliminates the worry of cross contamination of foods. It’s durable, reusable and naturally non-stick so cleanup is a breeze. Dishwasher safe for easy cleanup. Stores easily laying flat or rolled up. This Toaster Oven Size Baking Mat (7.875-inch x 10.87-inch) fits standard toaster ovens and convection ovens. Instructions included. Cautions: Do not use knives, scrapers, brushes or cutters on the Baking Mat. Do not cut on, or fold, the Baking Mat; store it flat or rolled. Do not grease the Baking Mat. Mrs. Anderson's Baking, a go-to brand for the home baker. Brought to you by HIC Harold Import Co.

Feature: Mrs. Anderson's Non-Stick Silicone Toaster Oven Baking Mat for toasting, reheating, melting, browning and baking foods in convection and toaster ovens
Made from FDA-approved silicone and natural glass fibers for even heat transfer; non-porous surface eliminates worry of cross contamination of food
Naturally non stick for quick release of foods and easy cleanup; no greasing or added oils necessary; durable and reusable for thousands of uses
Temperature safe from -40 degrees to 480 degrees Fahrenheit; reusable and more economical than using parchment paper
Measures 7.875-inch x 10.87-inch; holds 12 (2-inch) or 6 (2.5-inch) cookies; fits standard convection and toaster ovens; dishwasher safe
attributes.Label: Mrs. Anderson's Baking
attributes.Title: Mrs. Anderson's Baking Non-Stick Silicone Toaster Oven Baking Mat, 7.875-Inch x 10.87-Inch

B00451B7U2.title: Oster Convection Toaster Oven, 6 Slice, Brushed Stainless Steel (TSSTTVRB04)

descriptions.title: Product Description
descriptions.content: Cook with the convenience of an oven on your countertop using the Oster 6-Slice Convection Toaster Oven. Featuring a sleek brushed stainless steel housing, this toaster oven uses convection technology to distribute heat evenly for thorough cooking and excellent results. The oven's generously sized interior offers enough space to accommodate a large frozen pizza, while its adjustable rack can be placed in two positions, so you can customize the space whether you’re cooking a tall roast or baking chocolate chip cookies. An energy-efficient alternative to turning on the full-size oven, this countertop toaster offers three user-friendly control dials for selecting the cooking function, adjusting the temperature to up to 450 degrees Fahrenheit, and setting the 60-minute timer. The timer can also be turned to the stay-on position for continuous cooking. The Oster 6-Slice Convection Toaster Oven also features a transparent door for checking the status of your food at a glance, a wide easy-grip door handle, an easy-to-clean interior, and an internal removable crumb tray for convenient cleaning. It comes with a durable baking pan.

Feature: 6-slice toaster oven with convection technology for faster, more even cooking
Wide temperature range of 150 to 450 degrees F lets you cook with convenience of an oven
Versatile toast, bake, and adjustable broil functions; 60-minute timer with auto shut-off
2 rack positions to accommodate a wide variety of foods from tall roasts to pizza
Includes removable crumb tray and durable baking pan

attributes.Title: Oster Convection Toaster Oven, 6 Slice, Brushed Stainless Steel (TSSTTVRB04)

B074XR43G4.title: Russell Hobbs Retro Style 1.7L Electric Kettle, Red & Stainless Steel, KE5550RDR

descriptions.title: Product Description
descriptions.content:
Sleeping in on a rainy day, laughing with friends, sipping a warm cup of tea –it’s the smallest pleasures that bring us the biggest enjoyment. Now you can experience the simple joy of a RUSSELL HOBBS Retro Style Electric Kettle. Whether you’re new to electric kettles or have been enjoying them your entire life, you’ll fall in love with the innovative features of this charming kettle. Not a tea drinker? Quickly boil water for oatmeal, hot cocoa, French press coffee, or instant soup and more.

The retro-style design adds timeless beauty to any kitchen, no matter your kitchen style. Features like durable stainless steel construction with a pull-off lid, drip-free spout, and cool-touch handle make it as practical as it is elegant. The water temperature gauge on the front of the kettle simplifies the process of heating water to precise temperatures. The water level gauge on the rear of the kettle shows markings up to 1.7L, and the inside of the kettle features level markings for quickly boiling 1-3 cups of water. Additionally, the removable anti-scale filter helps prevent mineral buildup from passing through the spout. Enjoy the perfect cup, at the perfect temperature every time. It’s that simple.

Feature: Water Temperature Gauge - Achieve the optimal temperature for all varieties of tea, pour overs, and other recipes. The gauge on the front of the kettle shows the temperature of water inside the kettle, making it easy to stop boiling at the perfect moment.
Quick Boil Indicator - Level markings inside the kettle are visible from above, allowing you to accurately fill 1-3 cups of water for fast boiling.
Removable, Washable Filter - The filter attaches behind the pour spout to keep lime scale out of your beverages. Removable for easy cleaning.
Drip-Free Pouring - The pour spout is designed to prevent dripping by creating a single water stream that keeps the boiled water safely contained.

1.7L Capacity with Level Markings  - The large capacity makes this kettle ideal for families and for hosting events. Boil up to 1.7L of water, using the rear-facing water level gauge for accurate filling.

descriptions.content: This poly-filled pillow provides firm fluff and support. Filled with 100% soft polyester, nonallergenic.Whether you're using it solely as an accent piece to create interest in your room, or as a functional head pillow, this fashionable bedding accessory offers great looks and endless comfort. Made Exclusively by IZO All Supply in the U.S.A. Note to customers: For best results this insert is recommended for 16x16 sham covers, if your sham is 18x18 we recommend 20x20 inserts to provide a plump and full pillow from corner to corner. Made in the USA

Feature: Filled with 100% soft polyester non allergenic , soft and sumptuous yet firm
